text:
María Concepción César (born María Concepción Cesarano; 25 October 1926 – 26 July 2018) was an Argentine actress, singer and dancer. Her first movie was "Pampa Bárbara" with her uncle, actor Francisco Petrone. Her best known movies are "Savage Pampas" (1945) and "Rosaura a las 10" (1958). She was born in Buenos Aires.
César died of complications from Alzheimer's disease on 27 July 2018 in Buenos Aires at the age of 91.
